extension.name: System - CodeIs Google Analytics
extension.author: John
extension.description: CodeIs Google Analytics is sytem plugin, it can put Google Analytics tracking code into your Joomla site.

field.name: account_id
field.label: Web Property ID
field.description: This ID is unique to each site you want to track, and is in the form of UA-xxxxxxx-y. To get a Web Property ID, register your site with Google Analytics, or if you already have registered your site, go to your Google Analytics Settings page to see the ID next to every site profile.
